group_1.textRight: (...Who is that? And what's with this@tension in the air...?)

group_1.narration: It's really delicious! I think the only way to@describe this rice omelet is "deliciously delicious"!

group_1.textLeft: Um...all you said in the second half was@"delicious" though?

group_1.textRight: Because your food is so delicious, I can@only say it's delicious!
...Are you filming some sort of gourmet show?

group_1.textLeft: Huh, Senpai...?@Sorry, I didn't notice you.

group_1.textRight: Oh, you've got some nerve ignoring ME,@Ria Ami!

group_1.textLeft: I'm a little busy right now...

group_1.textRight: Hey Manaka, hey Manaka...!@Look, I even wrote down a review!

group_1.textLeft: All you wrote was "delicious" anyways,@didn't you?!
Also, my Senpai just got here, so please@calm down a bit!

group_1.textRight: Senpai...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Wow, she's beautiful...!

group_1.textRight: You...have quite a good eye!
So you're a friend of Manaka's...@Is that correct?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! I'm Tsumugi Wakana, Manaka's@best friend!
Best friend, you say...
We've only known each other for@a week!

group_1.textRight: That's not true!
I've known about you since the very first@day of school.
I always thought of you as the girl who@smells delicious...

group_1.textLeft: Uhh...@That's plain scary...
You're like some kind of animal that@judges by smell...

group_1.textRight: Woof!

group_1.textLeft: Please don't lose your human dignity!

group_1.textRight: ...I'm beginning to understand what@you mean by "a little busy".

group_1.textLeft: And you, don't just stand there,@please say something!
That's right! You should say something@to Manaka too!
Tell her she should accept my help!

group_1.textRight: Ummm...I don't see what you mean...

group_1.textLeft: I'm trying to make Walnut's more popular...
I want to help in any way I can!
So, look! I even wrote this review!

group_1.narration: The Best Western Restaurant in the World is Walnut's@Rating: ★★★★★

If you asked me where the best food in the world is,@I would say Walnut's, and I would give it 5000 stars!@If there's one delicious dish that everyone in the world@should eat, it's the delicious rice omelet here!

group_1.textLeft: If you post this on a food report site,@it'll be a great advertisement!
You're giving it way too much credit! No matter@how you look, doesn't it seem completely fake?

group_1.textRight: You have to write something like this@to convey how delicious it is!
Hey, Senpai, you think this review is@good too, don't you?
...Uhh, to begin with, you've only known her@for a week...
Why are you so invested in this...?

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's a long story.
A week ago, when I was picked up by Manaka...

group_1.textRight: [chara:301001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Picked up?! Are you some sort of stray dog?!
